languages.text: Боевой препарат, выводящий физическое состояние бойца на пик, но дурно сказывающийся на ментальном состоянии.
Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.
languages.original_text: Боевой препарат, выводящий физическое состояние бойца на пик, но дурно сказывающийся на ментальном состоянии.

traits.locale_text: Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.
Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.
Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.
Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.
Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.

languages.text: Medicación de combate que amplifica el estado físico de un combatiente al máximo a costa de afectar negativamente a su estado mental.
languages.original_text: Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.

traits.locale_text: Medicación de combate que amplifica el estado físico de un combatiente al máximo a costa de afectar negativamente a su estado mental.

languages.text: Ce médicament élaboré spécifiquement pour le combat permet aux soldats d'atteindre leur potentiel physique maximal, mais au détriment de leur santé mentale.
languages.original_text: Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.

traits.locale_text: Ce médicament élaboré spécifiquement pour le combat permet aux soldats d'atteindre leur potentiel physique maximal, mais au détriment de leur santé mentale.

languages.text: 用来辅助战斗的药物，可以将战士的身体状况提升至巅峰状态，但也会对精神产生不良影响。
languages.original_text: Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.

traits.locale_text: 用来辅助战斗的药物，可以将战士的身体状况提升至巅峰状态，但也会对精神产生不良影响。

languages.text: 戦闘用の薬物で、戦闘員の肉体的コンディションを最高のパフォーマンス値まで高める。ただし、精神状態には悪影響を及ぼす。
languages.original_text: Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘用の薬物で、戦闘員の肉体的コンディションを最高のパフォーマンス値まで高める。ただし、精神状態には悪影響を及ぼす。

languages.text: Medikamente für den Kampfeinsatz, welche den körperlichen Zustand eines Kämpfers bis zum Optimum verstärkt, sich aber negativ auf seinen mentalen Zustand auswirkt.
languages.original_text: Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.

traits.locale_text: Medikamente für den Kampfeinsatz, welche den körperlichen Zustand eines Kämpfers bis zum Optimum verstärkt, sich aber negativ auf seinen mentalen Zustand auswirkt.

languages.text: Savaşçıyı fiziken en yüksek performans değerlerine yükseltirken zihinsel durumu üzerinde tersi etki yaratan, askerî amaçlı ilaç.
languages.original_text: Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.
